channel.title: Networking on A Happy PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on A Happy PhD

item.title: Tips for attending scientific conferences
item.description: Going to an international conference, to present your own work or to better understand a scientific community, is usually an intense (even stressful) experience. As a doctoral student, probably even more so. In this post I share a selection of advice and tricks to make your next conference more pleasant (and useful in the long-term). Go forth, and enjoy a few days of “geeking out” with fellow researchers!
